(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Advertorial) (NNP Brewing))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NNP Perfect) (NNP Cup))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNP Tea))))
          (VP (MD might) (RB not)
            (VP (VB be)
              (NP
                (NP
                  (NP (NN everyone) (POS 's))
                  (NN Cup))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP Tea)))))))))
    (: ...)))


nn(Brewing-2, Advertorial-1)
root(ROOT-0, Brewing-2)
det(Cup-5, a-3)
nn(Cup-5, Perfect-4)
nsubj(Cup-13, Cup-5)
prep(Cup-5, of-6)
pobj(of-6, Tea-7)
aux(Cup-13, might-8)
neg(Cup-13, not-9)
cop(Cup-13, be-10)
poss(Cup-13, everyone-11)
possessive(everyone-11, 's-12)
rcmod(Brewing-2, Cup-13)
prep(Cup-13, of-14)
pobj(of-14, Tea-15)

    (ADVP (RB yet))

          (, ,))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ great) (NN thing))
      (PP (IN about)
        (NP (PRP it))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (RB much) (JJR easier))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB brew)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (NN cup))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN tea))))
                  (PP (IN than)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (NN cup))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NN coffee))))))))))))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NNP Tea))

        (S
          (NP (PRP It))
          (VP (VBZ goes)
            (PP (IN without)

                                    (VP (VBG using)

  (S
    (SBAR (IN Whether)
      (S
        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN tea))
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (VP (VBN manufactured)
            (PP (IN by)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN orthodox))
                (CC or)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP CTC) (NN process))))))))

      (VP (VB make)
        (NP (DT a) (NN difference))

            (NP (DT the) (NN flavor)
              (CC and)
              (NN aroma))
            (PP (IN of)

    (. .)))

            (NP (NNS teas))
            (VP (VBN grown)
              (PP (IN between)
                (NP (NN sea) (NN level)))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (CD 1000) (NNS feet))))))))
    (. .)))

        (PP (IN by)
          (NP
            (QP (RB around) (CD 80))
            (NNS degrees))))
      (CC and)
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB only))
        (VBZ gets)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (CD 100) (NNS degrees) (NNS celcius))
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB when))
              (S
                (NP (PRP it))
                (VP (VBZ hits)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ vigorous) (NN boil))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (NN period))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (NN time)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

nsubj(starts-3, water-2)
root(ROOT-0, starts-3)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ second) (NN thing))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB never))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB use)
            (NP (NN detergent))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB wash)
                  (NP (PRP$ your) (NN teapot))))))))
      (SBAR (IN as)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (MD may)
            (VP (VB leave)
              (NP (DT some) (JJ nasty) (NN fragrance))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (DT the) (NN pot))))))))
    (. .)))

amod(thing-3, second-2)
nsubj(is-4, thing-3)
root(ROOT-0, is-4)
neg(is-4, never-5)

dobj(use-7, detergent-8)

xcomp(use-7, wash-10)

dobj(wash-10, teapot-12)

  (S

        (S
          (NP (PRP he))

            (NP (PRP$ his) (NNS weekends))
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ own) (NN family))
                (VP (VBG visiting)
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ various) (NN charity) (NNS projects))
                  (SBAR (IN that)
                    (S
                      (NP (NNP Dilmah))
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (VP (VBN involved)
                          (PP (IN with)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(shared-2, Dilhan-1)
root(ROOT-0, shared-2)
prep(shared-2, with-3)
pobj(with-3, me-4)
mark(spends-7, that-5)
nsubj(spends-7, he-6)
ccomp(shared-2, spends-7)
poss(weekends-9, his-8)
dobj(spends-7, weekends-9)
prep(spends-7, with-10)
poss(family-13, his-11)
amod(family-13, own-12)
pobj(with-10, family-13)
partmod(family-13, visiting-14)
det(projects-18, the-15)
amod(projects-18, various-16)
nn(projects-18, charity-17)
dobj(visiting-14, projects-18)
mark(involved-22, that-19)
nsubjpass(involved-22, Dilmah-20)
auxpass(involved-22, is-21)
ccomp(visiting-14, involved-22)
prep(involved-22, with-23)

  (S
    (NP (DT These))
    (VP (VBP range)

        (NP
          (NP
            (NP (JJ environmental) (NNS projects))

              (NP (PRP$ their) (NN elephant) (NNS orphanages)))

              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (VP (VBP look)
                  (SBAR (IN after)
                    (S
                      (NP (NNS elephants))

                        (PP (IN by)
                          (NP (DT the) (JJ civil) (NN war)))
                        (PP (TO to)
                          (NP (DT the) (JJ various) (NNS creches))))))))))

            (NP (JJ medical) (NNS centres))

              (WHNP (WDT that))
              (S
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBN supported)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PDT All) (DT these) (NNS projects))
    (VP (VBP demonstrate)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (S
            (NP (NNP Dilmah))
            (VP (VBZ 's)
              (S
                (NP (NN commitment))
                (`` ``)
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB make)
                    (NP (NN business))
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (NN matter))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (JJ human) (NN service))))))
                ('' ''))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADJP (JJ good)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB know)
                      (SBAR (IN that)
                        (WHADVP (WRB when))
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP you))
                          (VP (VBP drink)
                            (NP
                              (NP (PRP$ your) (NN cup))
                              (PP (IN of)
                                (NP (NN tea))))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

  (S
    (VP (VB Read)
      (PP (IN about)
